text: Aspergillus bertholletius is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Flavi section. The species was first described in 2012. It has been isolated from Brazil nuts (Bertholletia excelsa). ==Growth and morphology== A. bertholletius has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_bertholletius_cya.png|Aspergillus bertholletius growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_bertholletius_meaox.png|Aspergillus bertholletius growing on MEAOX plate ==References== bertholletius Category:Fungi described in 2012
title: Aspergillus bertholletius
